channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Page Generator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Page Generator

item.title: CVE-2022-2100|2024-08-03T00:24:44.173Z -- unknown -- page%20generator
item.description: The Page Generator WordPress plugin before 1.6.5 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
